nodes.text: Romi Moola was a female Twi'lek who formerly served Jabba the Hutt during the waning years of the Republic Classic era. In 32 BBY, a bounty was placed after she escaped Jabba's Palace while attempting to kill him by poisoning his chuba stew only to have it kill his loyal chef instead. She was captured by Jango Fett who claimed the bounty.
Romi Moola's bounty is worth 3,000 credits alive and 1,500 credits dead.
